TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Selection extends System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem

Docs.summary: Defines a selection of objects that are published as a in the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Selections consist of zero or more objects. The first object in a selection is defined as the primary selection, which is used when one object in a group must be used as a key. Each object is stored as a <xref:System.WorkflowModel.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>.
## Examples [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

Docs.summary: Creates a object with the specified objects selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The first object is considered the primary selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> selectedObjects, class System.Predicate`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> match) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration of objects that should be selected.
The criteria for including objects. Only those objects in `selectedObjects` that match the predicate will be added to the selection.
Docs.summary: Creates a object with the specified objects selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The first object in the enumeration that matches the predicate is considered the primary selection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed Type ItemType { get; }

Docs.summary: Returns the item type for this editing context item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an override of <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem.ItemType%2A>. When you create a derived class, override this property to return the <xref:System.Type> of the derived type.

Docs.value: Returns the primary selection as a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection Select(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem itemToSelect) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context to apply this selection change to.
Docs.summary: A selection helper method that takes the existing selection in the context and selects an item into it. If the item is already in the selection, the selection is preserved and the item is promoted to the primary selection.
Docs.returns: A Selection object that contains the new selection.

Docs.value: Returns the selected objects as an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.

Docs.summary: The number of objects that are currently selected in this selection.
Docs.value: Returns the number of selected objects as an <xref:System.Int32>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection SelectOnly(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem itemToSelect) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context to apply this selection change to.
Docs.summary: A selection helper method that sets an item into the selection. Any existing items are deselected.
Docs.returns: A Selection object that contains the new selection.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Subscribe (System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback<System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection> handler);

.method public static hidebysig void Subscribe(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection> handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context to listen to.
The handler to be invoked when the selection changes.
Docs.summary: A helper method that subscribes to selection change events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection Toggle(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem itemToToggle) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context to apply this selection change to.
The item to toggle selection for.
Docs.summary: A selection helper method that takes the existing selection in thecontext and creates a new selection that contains the toggled state of the item. If the item is to be added to the selection, it is added as the primary selection.
Docs.returns: A Selection object that contains the new selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection Union(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem itemToAdd) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context to apply this selection change to.
The item to add to the selection.
Docs.summary: A selection helper method that takes the existing selection in the context and creates a new selection that contains the original selection and the specified item to add. If the specified item to add is already in the original selection, it is promoted to the primary selection.
Docs.returns: A Selection object that contains the new selection.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Unsubscribe (System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback<System.Activities.Presentation.View.Selection> handler);

Docs.param: The editing context to listen to.
The handler to be invoked when the selection changes.
Docs.summary: A helper method that removes a previously added selection change event.
